column3: Unfortunately this PR doesn't actually improve performance. cea215c appears to be the culprit, and with some tweaks to allow more fails it can do better than #6421 but not so much better that I think this is the right approach.\nSome very high fee rate transactions up to 400k satoshis/kB get rejected by both pulls.
